title: Stone Flounder
content:
Stone Flounder is a type of fish caught on the East Beach, requiring Level 12 Fishing. It may be obtained by Catching the Stone Flounder skill nodes and grants +88 experience when successful. Alternatively, the Stone Flounder may also be obtained when opening the Old trunk inside of the Barracks.

The are currently no known uses for the fish, other than for profit. The fish may be sold to the Fishmonger for 240 Copper.
